articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: Watch: Nitish Rana's Adorable Meeting With Mother After KKR's Win vs PBKS In IPL 2023 - NDTV Sports
articles.description: After their win over PBKS, KKR shared a heart-warming video on social media in which Nitish Rana could be seen hugging his mother.
articles.content: Rinku Singh added another bright chapter to his legend as a "finisher" with a last-ball boundary as Kolkata Knight Riders beat Punjab Kings by five wickets on Monday to keep their IPL play-off hopes … [+1359 chars]
